issue.title: Removing model from plugin crashes with null pointer

content.raw: Alright. FYI, the "clear" branch seems to be a different issue - indeed it doesn't seem to segfault if the deleted model doesn't have a sensor (an IMU sensor, at least). This is my workaround for now, I don't need the sensors for contact detection, so I remove them before inserting the model. Would you like me to report a different issue for this?
content.html: Alright. FYI, the "clear" branch seems to be a different issue - indeed it doesn't seem to segfault if the deleted model doesn't have a sensor (an IMU sensor, at least). This is my workaround for now, I don't need the sensors for contact detection, so I remove them before inserting the model. Would you like me to report a different issue for this?
